title: Ronald L. Goins | Obituaries | state-journal.com
text:
Ronald L. Goins of Frankfort, Kentucky, passed away at Norton Hospital after a sudden illness on December 25, 2023.
Ronnie was born in Franklin County on July 9, 1947, to Joe and Sylvia (Perry) Goins. He attended Bald Knob Elementary School and Franklin County High School. He liked to joke and tell people he attended Bald Knob University.
